intro.p: The GStreamer team is proud to announce the third bugfix release in the stable 1.12 release series of your favourite cross-platform multimedia framework!
This release only contains bugfixes and it is safe to update from 1.12.x. For a full list of bugfixes see Bugzilla.
See &site;/releases/1.12/ for the full release notes.

bug.summary: gst-rtsp-server: huge delay for the client to connect sometimes
-uninstalled.pc file is installed by meson build
